nodes.name: Imperial Legion Basic Training
nodes.summary: Take part in basic training when you join the Imperial Legion.

nodes.name: Hungering for Faith
nodes.summary: Carnius Magius' cook is missing. Follow his steps to find him and reveal the reason behind his disappearance. Part of the 2025 Winter Modjam.

nodes.name: Elsa the Fryse Hag
nodes.summary: Become a Fryse Hag, do quests for them and learn their secrets.

nodes.name: The Tale of the Frost Sprites
nodes.summary: There is a legend from Lokken Island that talks about Frost Sprites. Get familiar with the tale, and complete a short quest about it.

nodes.name: Jump Challenges
nodes.summary: Complete a series of jump challenges for small rewards. Great for an acrobat character!

nodes.name: The Dancer's Grace
nodes.summary: Help a dancer introduce a new exotic dance style to the taverns of Vvardenfell and learn a lesson in acrobatics in return.

nodes.name: Ethereal Magic
nodes.summary: Join the Magesâ€™ Guild in Gnisis and help in their research concerning ethereal magic. Part of the Morrowind Modding Madness Competition.

nodes.name: Monroewind
nodes.summary: Find the artifacts of Meralyn, the famous Dunmer bard for a reward.

nodes.name: Feminist Nerevarine
nodes.summary: Provides you the opportunity to side with women in quests where you couldn't do it previously, or to refuse siding with them in a less hostile manner than the game forced you in vanilla.

nodes.name: Moon Magic
nodes.summary: Find moonstones scattered around Vvardenfell and learn new, moon-themed spells in exchange. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Half-Vampire
nodes.summary: Optionally start the game as a half-vampire. The mod does not resort to forcing you to pick a custom race or birthsign.

nodes.name: Hand of Almalexia
nodes.summary: An alternative reward for completing the Main Quest of Tribunal: become one of the Hands of Almalexia and earn the right to wear your own set of their armor.

nodes.name: Branded as a Criminal
nodes.summary: Get away with committing serious crimes by agreeing to be branded as a criminal and to live the rest of your life as an outcast of society.

nodes.name: Your Own Ashlander Tribe
nodes.summary: Become the Ashkhan of your own Ashlander tribe and do quests for its members.

nodes.name: Sixth House Pirates
nodes.summary: Defeat a crew of bloodthirsty Sixth House pirates and take their treasure!

nodes.name: Main Quest for Divayth Fyr
nodes.summary: Do the Main Quest for Divayth Fyr. Includes a Chargen scenario in which you are one of the clones created by him.

nodes.name: Hero or Villain
nodes.summary: Do the people of Morrowind view you as a hero or a villain? This mod lets you keep track of this.

nodes.name: Sunflowers in Morrowind - For Ukraine
nodes.summary: Adds sunflowers to Morrowind, to the Ascadian Isles Region. All the Donation Points earned from this mod will support Ukraine in their struggle against their Russian invaders.

nodes.name: Ald Redaynia Mod N. 147
nodes.summary: Yet another Ald Redaynia mod, with some unique features.

nodes.name: Join the Royal Guards
nodes.summary: Become a Royal Guard and do quests for them.

nodes.name: Imperial Knights Faction
nodes.summary: Adds the Imperial Knights into the game, as a joinable faction.

nodes.name: Ebony Shortsword Challenge
nodes.summary: An ebony shortsword is hidden somewhere in the western half of Vvardenfell. Will you be able to find it?

nodes.name: Orphaned Etymology Exterminator
nodes.summary: Rewrites all the 'orphaned etymology' words, and all the references to them.

nodes.name: Chieftain of Thirsk and Blodskaal
nodes.summary: Displays your status as 'Blodskaal' and 'Chieftain of Thirsk' on your character sheet, and also makes 'Skaal' and 'Thirsk' proper factions, with all the relevant NPCs added into them.

nodes.name: Thieves' Guild Overhaul
nodes.summary: A complete overhaul of the Thieves' Guild faction. New quests, tweaks for existing quests, items, and a lot more!

nodes.name: Anarchist Nerevarine
nodes.summary: A mysterious group is hiring the Dark Brotherhood to assassinate the nobles of the Empire. Will you take this job over from them? Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Get Paid in Drams
nodes.summary: Some of the native, xenophobic people and the criminal underworld will pay you for your services in Drams. (The native currency of Morrowind before the Empire - at least according to MK.) Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Maar Gan Hut - Reupload
nodes.summary: According to the original description on MMH:This plugin simply adds a quaint home in Maar Gan. The house is located right by the strider port, you can't miss it! There seemed to be a deficiency of housing choices in this area, so I decided

nodes.name: Freelancer - Reupload
nodes.summary: According to the original description on MMH:"Designed for those who prefer Morrowind life without faction complications, working as a freelancer for whoever has suitable work to offer."

nodes.name: Rin's Beauty Shop - Reupload
nodes.summary: According to its original description on MMH:"- This mod adds 17 playable female heads, 2 Dark Elf male heads and 10 kinds of hairstyles. This does not replace any of the games heads. - Visit Rin's shop at "Outffiter" in Balmora and enjoy

nodes.name: Dual Faction Membership for NPCs
nodes.summary: NPCs that actually belong to two factions will reflect this in their dialogue. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Cure all the Kwama Queens
nodes.summary: Cure all the Kwama Queens of Vvardenfell of their blight disease! Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Lord's Mail and Morningstars
nodes.summary: Fixes two inconsistencies in the game: one concerning the enchantment of Lord's Mail and another concerning the lack of morningstars in the game. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Fort Moonmoth Fundraiser Dinner
nodes.summary: Makes the fundraiser dinner at Fort Moonmoth actually take place. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Immersive Neloth Reward
nodes.summary: Makes Neloth's reward for retrieving the Robe of the Drake's Pride more immersive. Also provides some additional tweaks for that quest. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Harvest's End Festival
nodes.summary: The Harvest's End Festival will take place in Ebonheart! Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Epilogue - Sail to Akavir
nodes.summary: Provides a way for closing your game: A new quest, in which you can prepare for the Nerevarine's eventual expedition to Akavir. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Daedric Crescent of Icarian Flight
nodes.summary: Changes the enchantment of the Daedric Crescent Blade to reflect its appearance in Weapon Sheathing better. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Joinable Sixth House - So to Speak
nodes.summary: Join the Sixth House! So to speak. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Consequences for Looting the Andrano Tomb
nodes.summary: There will be visible consequences for looting the Andrano Ancestral Tomb as part of the Main Quest now. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: The Mystery of the Ghost Snake
nodes.summary: Unravel the mystery of the Ghost Snake.

nodes.name: Therana vs Trerayna
nodes.summary: An alternative solution for the "A Bounty for Trerayna Dalen" quest: side with Trerayna instead of Therana.

nodes.name: Elisamsi Follower
nodes.summary: An Ordinator follower named Elisamsi with her own backstory. Commentary on quests and some character development.

nodes.name: Exterminate all the Brutes
nodes.summary: Adds a new quest for exterminating the entire Sixth House faction.

nodes.name: The Pyres of Purification
nodes.summary: Adds the Pyres of Purification to Vivec City, where you can burn any heretical and unholy items that you may have come across during your travels.

nodes.name: Past Life Regressions
nodes.summary: Throughout the game, you receive visions of your previous life as Nerevar or as one of the failed incarnates (Ane Teria, Conoon Chodala, Erur-Dan, Hort Ledd, Idrenie Nerothan, Peakstar). The visions are triggered by visiting certain

nodes.name: Vorar Helas' Basement
nodes.summary: Adds a basement to Vorar Helas' house, with a small skooma (alchemy) lab, a bookshelf and some storage.

nodes.name: Teach Nels Llendo a Lesson
nodes.summary: Adds a new option for dealing with Nels Llendo. Teach him a lesson without killing him.

nodes.name: Intro video - Fargoth Narrator
nodes.summary: Makes Fargoth the narrator of the intro video of the game.

nodes.name: Vampire Nerevarine
nodes.summary: Removes all the obstacles from becoming the Nerevarine as a vampire, and provides a lore-friendlyish explanation for it.

nodes.name: Call Incarnate
nodes.summary: Adds a new power named 'Call Incarnate' which summons a Failed Incarnate of the Nerevarine to fight alongside you. The mod also overhauls the Failed Incarnate NPCs in the Cavern of Incarnate.

nodes.name: Silt Strider Courier
nodes.summary: Adds a newspaper to Morrowind, which documents the news of the province - whether they happened due to the player's meddling or independently from that.

nodes.name: Hiring Guards for the Redoran Stronghold - Honorable Solution
nodes.summary: Provides an honorable solution for hiring the Fighters' Guild for protecting the Redoran Stronghold - actually paying for their services instead of participating in a jailbreak.

nodes.name: Duke's Throne Room Overhaul
nodes.summary: Makes the upper floor of the Grand Council Chambers of Ebonheart a proper throne room.

nodes.name: Bal Molagmer Add-on
nodes.summary: Adds three more quests for the Bal Molagmer.

nodes.name: Home in Ebonheart Chargen
nodes.summary: Chargen mod. Start the game in your house to the south of Ebonheart, next to the lake.

nodes.name: Fargoth Intervention
nodes.summary: Adds a new spell: Fargoth Intervention (teleports you to Fargoth) and a short quest to acquire it.

nodes.name: Blades Informant
nodes.summary: Allows you to continue working for the Blades after Caius' departure and deliver useful information to them that you may have picked up during your travels. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Lore-Friendly Bal Molagmer Gloves
nodes.summary: Gives a lore-friendly and balanced enchantment for the Bal Molagmer gloves. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: Morvayn Manor in Maar Gan
nodes.summary: Moves Morvayn Manor to Maar Gaan, and integrates the area near Huleen's hut into the town better. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: FMI - Alice's Package
nodes.summary: Various fixes of gameplay vs. lore inconsistencies. Part of the May Modathon Month 2020.

nodes.name: Pacifist Options - When it Makes Sense
nodes.summary: Provides you pacifist options to complete several quests in vanilla Morrowind - provided that it would make sense that such an option would exist. Part of the May Modathon Month.

nodes.name: The Last of the Redas Family
nodes.summary: Provides three different methods to fix the inconsistency concerning the vanilla Redas Tomb quest and the last of the Redas family. Part of the May Modathon Month 2020.

nodes.name: Hostages
nodes.summary: Adds hostages to random dungeons of Vvardenfell and the opportunity for you to free them. Part of the May Modathon Month 2020.

nodes.name: Telvanni Staff for the Telvanni Staff
nodes.summary: Adds a Silver Staff of Peace into the inventory of each Mouth in the Telvanni Council.

nodes.name: Cool Khuul Docks
nodes.summary: Moves the Khuul docks from open sea into the bay.

nodes.name: Imperial Cult Supply Chest
nodes.summary: Adds a Supply Chest for the Imperial Cult.

nodes.name: Magicka Expanded - Unobtainable Powers
nodes.summary: Allows you to obtain two unobtainable powers that were present in the CS, but not used in the final game, through the Magicka Expanded framework.

nodes.name: Cavern Tavern
nodes.summary: Adds a new tavern to Gnisis, for Redoran patriots.

nodes.name: Winged Guar Balcony
nodes.summary: Visual overhaul of the balcony of the Winged Guar tavern in Mournhold.

nodes.name: Morag Tong Supply Chest
nodes.summary: Adds a Supply Chest for the Morag Tong.

nodes.name: LeFemm Armor - Alice's version
nodes.summary: This mod fixes the bug with the LeFemm Armor official plugin that Sirollus Saccus wouldn't sell the pieces to the player. - In a different fashion than other, existing fixes.

nodes.name: NPC Faction Affiliation Corrector
nodes.summary: Adds NPCs into factions, that are not in a faction, but realistically should be, or change the faction of some NPCs that belong to a faction when they should belong to another.

nodes.name: Mournhold Courtiers - Mournhold Palace Revamped Compatible
nodes.summary: A version of TaiyakaJade's excellent "Mournhold Courtiers" mod, which contains everything from the original mod, and is compatible with Princess Stomper's Mournhold Palace Revamped mod.

nodes.name: Tribunal Temple Supply Chest
nodes.summary: Adds a Supply Chest for the Tribunal Temple.

nodes.name: Sixth House Smugglers
nodes.summary: Adds Sixth House smugglers to some smuggler caves, and a non-journal quest to hunt them all down.

nodes.name: More Redoran Master Helms
nodes.summary: Adds a Redoran Master Helm into the home of almost every Redoran Councilor.

nodes.name: What is something that can be perceived with one of your senses of life  - Something edgy related to death my brother
nodes.summary: Adds Dark Brotherhood armor to the members of the faction in Vvardenfell.

nodes.name: Blight at the Hairat-Vassamsi Egg Mine
nodes.summary: Allows you to cure the kwama queen at the Hairat-Vassamsi Egg Mine.

nodes.name: Ajira Deflowered
nodes.summary: Modifies Ajira's inventory to be consistent with her quest, in which she asks you to acquire some flowers.
